00033 @interface UIViewController()
00034 
00035 - (id)_retain;
00036 
00037 @end
00038 
00039 
00040 @implementation UIViewController()
00041 
00042 - (id)_retain {
00043   // _retain has been swizzled so calling _retain here will actually call retain.
00044   [self _retain]; // Set a breakpoint here.
00045 }
00046 
00047 @end
00048 
00049 - (BOOL)              application: (UIApplication *)application
00050     didFinishLaunchingWithOptions: (NSDictionary *)options {
00051 
00052   // Swap the default retain implementation with our custom implementation with which we can
00053   // visually set a breakpoint.
00054   NISwapMethods([UIViewController class], @selector(retain), @selector(_retain));
00055 
00056 }
